channel.title: Help changing the server name and xp on 508 cource
channel.description: Can someone IM or post how to change the server name and XP rate. my aim is kakashi1708 and yahoo IM is devil_boy_142005 please help ; ;

item.title: Help changing the server name and xp on 508 cource
item.dc:creator: @darklom darklom
item.description:
@darklom wrote:

yeah go to login.java
ctrl + f
Search for the owner or name of the source… and change it to yours…

Read full topic

item.title: Help changing the server name and xp on 508 cource
item.dc:creator: @darklom darklom
item.description:
@darklom wrote:

I guess not but give them some credit
ok this is what you have to do…
Go to www.no-ip.com
Log into your account
Manage Hosts
And either edit or add a new one
If you edit there is were you can change your .no-ip
If you need further assistance feel free to reply!

Read full topic
